A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie ruined my childhood and the entire Star Wars series. 2.5 hours of boredom. Nameless\, faceless side characters who don't belong on a television screen\, much less in a movie\, much less a Star Wars movie\, take leadership over  suspineless and seemingly powerless leadership. The plot \nheld together about as well as a grilled cheese sandwich. \nI never thought I would say this but\, I miss George Lucas.
